Posts.Content: Hello Yes I've had appointments and a booklet from the Kent Oncology centre, definitely no mention about swimming so as you say each have their own protocols.  Really glad I started a folder and keep everything together and refer to.  Just in case I've  booked a pedicure and massage so I won't be in the water much! Off to practice my deep inspiration breath hold technique! Good luck to everyone tomorrow Love Melissa x
Posts.Title: July 2018 Radiotherapy Club

Posts.Title: July 2018 Radiotherapy Club

Posts.Content: Hello Moomc same here 5 days later, it’s the itching just above my boob (area been exposed to sun previously) using hydrocortisone, aveeno and lately sudocrem cream - driving me potty! But never mind - it’s over! Yay good luck to everyone melissa xx
Posts.Title: July 2018 Radiotherapy Club

Posts.Content: Hi israel  I’m the same dates as you but they phoned me Friday and said they want to do another ct scan on the Tuesday and could I practice deep breaths this weekend as I might have to do them from Wednesday onwards but it shouldn’t make any difference to my days, because I am desperate to finish on the 27th because we go away!  I asked for early appointment times and boy have I got them mainly 8am, but mustn’t grumble everyone is being lovely although I miss the breast unit in a funny way!, oncology seems way more scarey!  Finally I’ve a spa day booked on Wednesday, no one had mentioned to me no swimming, should I check, I just presumed so long as I showered and moisturised I’d be ok? many thanks love Mel x
Posts.Title: July 2018 Radiotherapy Club

Posts.Content: Hi having my second bladder infection since starting letrozole, there must be a link? It helps to drink gallons of water but sending a specimen to the drs tomorrow. Do others get this and I also get pins and needles in my wrists and fingers  just when I thought this was all over! hugs to everyone melissa x
Posts.Title: Letrozole and UTI
